body:
I did a check with [brokenlinkcheck.com](https://www.brokenlinkcheck.com/) for this website and got the followingresults. Some of these might be worth checking and updating.

comment_data.body: useful, thanks. All of the `http://` (not https) URLs are also flagged by automation (but currently doesn't fail CI because we need to fix the links...): https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/56998feebd6f7ec0ab68e44cba3425bf39d448b4/scripts/gen_help_html.lua#L314-L317
I'll start looking into links I can fix. I'll keep a checklist in the issue description to track what's already done. I'll reach out to you when I have questions.
Docs generation has greatly improved since this was reported. There are probably still links to be fixed, feel free to rerun the analysis, but probably in a new issue.

title: 404s, bad hosts, timeouts for URLs
